DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study establish optimal strategy side branch stenting coronary bifurcation lesion .
DOC.brief_title: Optimal Strategy Side Branch Stenting Coronary Bifurcation Lesion
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate relative efficacy safety conservative strategy compare aggressive strategy side branch stenting coronary bifurcation lesion .
DOC.criteria: Parent vessel diameter stenosis > 75 % Parent vessel diameter stenosis 50 % 75 % angina and/or objective evidence ischemia noninvasive stress test The reference diameter branch 2.3 mm visual estimation Cardiogenic shock STelevation myocardial infarction within 48 hour symptom onset Left ventricular dysfunction ( echocardiographic leave ventricular ejection fraction < 25 % ) Graft vessel Patients receive clopidogrel due condition Patients receive warfarin , cilostazol antiplatelet therapy Hypersensitivity clopidogrel aspirin Expectant survival less 1 year Women plan become pregnant Patients bleed diathesis ( coagulopathy , thrombocytopenia platelet dysfunction , Gastrointestinal genitourinary bleeding within prior 3 month ) Patients actively participate another drug device investigational study , complete primary endpoint followup period .
